content.rendered:
Directed by Vamshi Paidipally

Written by Hari. Ahishor Solomon. Vamshi Paidipally. Hari. Ahishor Solomon. Vamshi Paidipally. Vamshi Paidipally. Bheem Srinivas

Cast Mahesh Babu (K. Rishi Kumar). Allari Naresh (Ravi Shankar). Pooja Hegde (Pooja). Jagapathi Babu (Vivek Mittal). Prakash Raj (K. Satyanarayana). Jayasudha (Rishi’s mother). Meenakshi Dixit (Nidhi). Vennela Kishore (Kanna). Ananya (Pallavi). Sai Kumar (Pallavi’s father). Kamal Kamaraju (S. Ajay Kumar). Tanikella Bharani (Ravi’s father). Nassar (Chief Minister). Rao Ramesh (Chandrasekhar). Mukesh Rishi (MP Bhanu Prasad). Kaikala Satyanarayana (Pooja’s paternal grandfather). Kota Srinivasa Rao (Pooja’s maternal grandfather). Annapoorna (Pooja’s grandmother). Aneesha Dama (Pooja’s sister). Krishna Murali Posani (Murali Krishna). Vidyullekha Raman (Pooja’s friend). Brahmaji (Pooja’s manager). Guruswami (Old farmer). Anish Kuruvilla (Venkatraman). Srinivasa Reddy (Ramakrishna). Rajeev Kanakala (Farmer). Prudhviraj (Journalist). Jhansi (TV Host). Ravi Prakash (Police officer) . Mahesh Achanta (Villager in Ramavaram). Sonia Albizuri (Journalist). Anand (A. Krishna Kishore). Rajiv Kumar Aneja (CBI Officer (as Rajiv Kumar A.)). Hasini Anvi (Family Member).Archana. Ayan ((as Ayan Nayak)).Babu. Joy Badlani (Jaydev Patil). Mohan Bhagat (Srinivas (as Mohan Bhagath)).Chalapathy.Chitti.Choudary.Rama Devi. Hriju Dhibar (Hriju).Divya. Deborah Finley (Origin Company Executive). Randhir Gatla (Rahul).Gururaj.Hasini.R.J. Hemant.Hemanth. Rich Henkels (Boardroom Excecutive).Sandhya Janak.Kanchan.Ravi Kiran.Koya Kishore. Richard Bhakti Klein (TV News Anchor (as R. Bhakti Klein)).John Kokken. Krishna Kranthi (Passenger).Krish.Kumar.Ashok Kumar. Pankaj Kumar (Student). Pankaj Kumar (Student).Roopa Lakshmi.Sri Lalitha.Lokesh. Abhishek Maharshi (Abhi).Malini.Gururaj Manepalli.Krishna Mohan.Murthy.Ramesh Naidu.Nandini.Swami Narayana.Bablu Nayak.Neelima.Paramesh.Siva Parvathi.Pawan.Francesca Pinto.Monica Pinto. Nicholas Pinto (Kid).Patricia Pinto.Priya.Priyanka.Raghavendra.Rakesh.Tulasi Ram.Dil Ramesh.Gemini Srinivas Rao.Koteshwara Rao. Deepak Ravella (Mohan). Rammohan Ravindran ((as Rammohan)).Rajeshwar Reddy.Ramesh Reddy.Teja Reddy.Riya.Saarma.Sreenivas Sai.Samba.Sameer.Santhoshi Sammidi.Sana.Shanoor Sana.Santhosh.Santhoshi.Satyanarayana.Kedar Shankar. Malhottra Shivam (Vivek Mittal’s PA).Siri. Sivannarayana (Pooja’s uncle).Sradda. Sravan (Shravan).D.D. Srinivas. Getup Srinu (Villager in Ramavaram (as Getup Seenu)).Subbaraju.Gemini Suresh.Surya.Swarna.Swathi. Juan Szilagyi (Board Executive).Viswa Teja.Umadevi. Divi Vadthya (Geetha).Ishika Varma.Meena Vasu.Ashrita Vemuganti.Vikas. Simone Xi (Office Worker).Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla. Jacki Thrapp (Businesswoman (uncredited))

Languages Telugu

Producers Kavin Anne. Ayan. Parv Bali. Guru Bobba. C. Aswani Dutt. Gaurav Gautam. Raj Kumar. Koti Paruchuri. Param V. Potluri. Pearl V. Potluri. E.V. Rajkumar. Dil Raju

Production PVP Cinema. Sri Venkateswara Creation. Vyjayanthi Movie
